title: Govt
clause_text: Govt./Semi-Govt./Appropriate Authority shall develop the infrastructure network within the layout (AH,POS & OA) to be handed over to MCGM (road + water supply mains + sewer line + storm water drain + street lights pertaining to that specific scheme) as per the requirements of the concerned departments.
